# Part A

## Q1
24:00011000

32:00100000

15:00001111

1:00000001

## Q2
10101010:170

01110100:116

11111111:255

10000000:128

## Q3
 10110
+00101
======
11011

 10101
+10111
======
01100
there is overflow

 10100
+00111
======
11011

 01111
+11110
======
01101
there is overflow

## Q4
-24:11101000

-32:11100000

-15:11110001

-1:11111111

# Part B
First:01001000 01010101 01001110 01010100 01000101 01010010

Last:01001100 01000001 01010101 01000100 01000101 01010010
